DOC.brief_summary: This PMS study had the objective to evaluate under ordinary medical care conditions the efficacy and tolerability of esomeprazole in patients who where treated by general practitioners and internists.
DOC.brief_title: German PMS Trial (AWB) to Evaluate Therapy in Reflux Disease and NSAR-Symptoms
DOC.criteria: Patients with GERD, or NSAID related ulcers, who need treatment with esomeprazole. Limitations; possible risks; warnings; contraindications mentioned in the SPC.
DOC.keyword: Patients with reflux symptoms or gastrointestinal symptoms after NSAR Treatment
